name: 教育研究論文寫作
description: 本課程的目的是幫助研究生進行教育研究論文的撰寫，尤其是英文期刊論文的撰寫。本課程的內容包括：評析教育研究論文、教育研究期刊分析、論文審查、論文格式與結構、論文全文撰寫。期望經由本課程的引導，修習本課程的學生能夠讓研究之論文有更好地呈現，甚至將成果發表在國際知名期刊。
goals: 了解論文審查要點與撰寫格式
撰寫教育研究期刊論文
syllabus:
Week 1 (February 22) Course introduction

Week 2 (March 01) (National holiday, No class)

Week 3 (March 08) One-to-one meeting (checking the data, research topic, and potential journal)

Week 4 (March 15) Tips for writing “Research purposes and questions”/ publication attitude

Week 5 (March 22) Tips for writing “Research method”

Week 6 (March 29) One-to-one meeting (Research purposes and questions)

Week 7 (April 05) (National holiday, No class) Self-directed learning assignment I

Week 8 (April 12) (Midterm, No class) Writing “Research method”

Week 9 (April 19) One-to-one meeting (Research Method)

Week 10 (April 26) Tips for writing “Research Results”

Week 11 (May 03) Tips for writing “Discussion, conclusion, and implications”

Week 12 (May 10) Tips for writing “Introduction and literature review”

Week 13 (May 17) One-to-one meeting (for Research Results and Discussion)

Week 14 (May 24) Searching literature by using relevant databases

Week 15 (May 31) Writing a good “Abstract” (30 mins)/ One-to-one meeting (Introduction and literature review)

Week 16 (June 07) Final paper submission (with abstract)/Self-directed learning assignment II

Note 1: For the weeks of one-to-one meeting, please email your writings (either in WORD or PDF format) beforehand.  
Tsai, Chin-Chung: tsaicc@ntnu.edu.tw  
Lin, Tzung-Jin: tzungjinlin@ntnu.edu.tw

Note 2：Each one-to-one meeting schedule will be prioritized for those who formally enrolled this course. For those who only intend to audit this course, they will be arranged when the instructors are available for discussions. Moreover, these auditing students will be given only twice opportunities at top for one-to-one meeting throughout the semester.

methodologies.note: 對期刊論文撰寫之要點進行講解
經上課時與同學之討論及一對一討論時間探討寫作方法與方向
以學生收集之資料分析並進行專題寫作

grading.note:
	Self-directed learning assignment I: Search 10 most relevant articles within recent five years and list them in APA style. Each article should have at least 5 sentences for summarizing its main ideas and relations with your own research. (10%)

	Self-directed learning assignment II: Search 5 most relevant journals and understand the scope and aims for each journal. Provide justifications of why each journal is suitable for publishing your own article. Also, search 3 most relevant articles within each journal for the references section. (10%)

	Submit research questions and purposes (10%)

	Submit the part of Research Method (10%)

	Submit the part of Results and Discussion (10%)

	Submit the part of Introduction and literature review(10%)

	Final paper submission (including abstract, main text and references) (20%)
